name: Sharkey's Barbequed Trout
author: Sharkey
summary: Delicious rainbow trout is marinated in a tangy sauce with rosemary, then barbequed on the grill.
directions: In a medium bowl, mix together soy sauce, vegetable oil, dried rosemary, ketchup and lemon juice
Place rainbow trout in a medium baking dish, and pour marinade over the fish
Refrigerate for approximately 1 hour, turning trout once
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium high heat and lightly oil grate
Drain excess marinade from fish, and transfer to a small saucepan
Bring marinade to a boil, and than remove from heat
Place trout on the prepared grill
Baste fish with remaining marinade sauce while grilling
Cook approximately 5 minutes on each side, or until tender and easily flaked
